summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4076 for the improvement of Shelton Street and Pearl Street, each from 13th Avenue South to 17th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 49077, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. .
